Cargamos el controlador (lpSolve), ya instalado.
```{r}
 library(lpSolveAPI)
```

Generamos el modelo

```{r}
modelo <- make.lp(0, 5)

set.objfn(modelo, c(634, 560, 570, 704, 812))

add.constraint(modelo, c(1,0,0,0,0), ">=", 36)
add.constraint(modelo, c(0,1,1,0,0), ">=", 45)
add.constraint(modelo, c(0,0,0,1,1), ">=", 10)
add.constraint(modelo, c(10,8,0,8,0), "<=", 480)
add.constraint(modelo, c(0,0,6,0,10), "<=", 480)
add.constraint(modelo, c(6,10,0,16,3), "<=", 480)
add.constraint(modelo, c(3,0,9,0,8), "<=", 480)

colNames<-c("A","B1","B2","C1","C2")
rowNames<-c("demA","demB","demC","CAPM1","CAPM2","CAPM3","CAPM4")
dimnames(modelo)<-list(rowNames,colNames)

modelo

```
```{r}
solve(modelo)
get.objective(modelo)
get.variables(modelo)
get.constraints(modelo)
get.dual.solution(modelo)
get.sensitivity.obj(modelo)
```
